results.title: The Working parent
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “PGR Series”.
Combining work with parenthood provides numerous pressures for working parents. P.G.R. looks at some of these problems, including house duties, mother’s re-entry to the workforce, workplace issues affecting women’s rights, managing chores while caring for children, and becoming a house husband. We talk to a number of people from a variety of backgrounds who have managed to balance the competing needs of their careers and their children.

results.title: Children and abuse
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “PGR Series”.
There are four different categories of child abuse: Neglect, Emotional Abuse, Physical Abuse and Sexual Abuse. Through parents relating personal stories of their children and their experiences with child abuse P.G.R discusses the ease of damage to young children through any of the defined forms of abuse. Ways to create a positive emotional environment for the child, how to handle potential child abuse situations, and the value of “special time” are all discussed with parents.

results.title: Early Learning
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “PGR Series”.
PGR discusses the question: who is the child’s first educator?, and we talk with parents about their role as educators. The role of kindergartens is examined, and we demonstrate how to encourage a love of learning. We look at the importance of language in the learning process, at various aspects of early speech acquisition, and provide tips on the encouragement of a child to develop language skills. PGR also examines the role books and music can play in a child’s early learning development, and we examine the social aspect of developing learning skills.

results.title: Suddenly you're a parent
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “PGR Series”.
Looks at the birth of a baby, examines the new born’s reflex abilities, and discusses the importance of movement and touch. The premature birth is also discussed.

results.title: The Single Parent
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “PGR Series”.
P.G.R. starts this topic by talking with a group of people about how they became single parents, and how they coped during the early stages. We then examine the problems of being a single parent, including household and financial management, helping children through this difficult period of their lives, and sharing the responsibility for the care of the kids. Finally, our guests reflect on their experiences, discussing the hardships and what they have gained as single parents.
